content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani

content: Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment. Based on the space and location, I believe we can come to an agreement on a rental price that will be mutually beneficial. Please let me know what you are willing to pay.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 500 Euros per month.

Mister Heine, I would like to ask if there is any possibility of negotiating a lower price.

I am a student and I am looking for a budget-friendly option. I would really appreciate it if you could consider my financial situation and offer a lower price.

Thank you for your understanding.
name: Maria Mamani

content: I understand your situation and appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, based on the market rates in the area, I believe the price of 500 Euros per month is fair and reflects the value of the apartment. I am sorry, but I am unable to negotiate a lower price at this time. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
TERMINATE.

Mister Heine, I am sorry but I have decided that the price of 500 Euros per month is not within my budget. I appreciate your time and consideration, but I am unable to accept the rental price you have proposed. Thank you for your understanding.
name: Maria Mamani

content: I understand your decision and appreciate your respectful communication. Thank you for your interest in the apartment. If you have any questions or need further assistance in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
